text: La Roue (, 'The Wheel') is a 1923 French silent drama movie directed by Abel Gance and starring Séverin-Mars, Ivy Close, Gabriel de Gravone, Pierre Magnier, Max Maxudian, Georges Térof. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1923 drama movies Category:1920s epic movies Category:French silent movies Category:French drama movies
title: La Roue
